itunes:title: West Coast Tour Announcement
title: West Coast Tour Announcement
description:
This is a super quick message to let you know we'll be having a You're Wrong About West Coast mini tour in September.

We'll be going to Portland on 9/16, Seattle (9/18), Los Angeles (9/20) and San Francisco (9/22).

There will be music and guests, and if it goes well we may do more of these in more cities.

I am letting you know in this quick announcement because tickets go on sale this Friday and they are first come, first served. But! There will be a one day pre-sale for our Patreon and Apple Plus supporters on Wednesday July 13th.

Here are the links to each show. 

https://event.etix.com/ticket/online/performanceSale.do?performance_id=4988321&method=restoreToken

https://www.seetickets.us/event/YOURE-WRONG-ABOUT-The-Vera-Project/493552

https://www.ticketweb.com/event/youre-wrong-about-the-masonic-lodge-at-hollywood-tickets/12269765?pl=HF

https://www.ticketmaster.com/event/1C005CE90C3A54C6

Patron:

https://www.patreon.com/yourewrongabout

Apple Plus: 

http://apple.co/ywa

I hope to see you there! 

Support the show
